name: ltaddsubi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1)))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wb(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c1), clt, c2), wbr(c0, clt, co(c2, cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
